name: task-management-system-using-microservices
description: A comprehensive task management system built with microservices architecture using Express.js, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Docker, and JWT authentication

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:gateway" "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:task" "npm run dev:notification" "npm run dev:reporting" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api-gateway && npm install && cd ../auth-service && npm install && cd ../task-service && npm install && cd ../notification-service && npm install && cd ../reporting-service && npm install && cd ../admin-service && npm install
